column2: Whew... I’m glad that Her Highness is absent.[~]The last thing I want is for her to be abducted again.
[f2]Hm? Again? But, when has she ever been taken before?[/f]
[f2]And it’s odd. While battling that Federation soldier, it felt...[~]as though some divine force was guiding my hand to victory.[/f]
Oh yes. I am far, [f2]far [/f]more tired than I thought.
